title: KeyTab
description: A customizable, cross-platform table booking system for restaurants, halls, and eateries.

title: Rewards Pro
description: A CMS with a loyalty rewards dashboard for businesses, allowing them to monitor reward points and user behavior.

title: Stock Sense
description: A stock management system for hotels, focused on inventory accuracy and operational efficiency.

title: Ayurware ERP
description: An ERP system for manufacturing ayurvedic medicines, enhancing process efficiencies across purchasing, sales, production, and packing.
